description:
Spacious, airy studio in the heart of the West Village. Recently refurbished with modern amenities in an elevator building. Three large windows let tons of light in. The apartment is perfectly located with many wonderful cafes, shops, and restaurants in immediate proximity.

Queen size bed with memory foam pillows.

It's only a short walk to the piers on the Hudson River waterfront, a perfect place to escape from the city's energy.

Very close to both the 1 subway and the PATH train for easy access to up town.
name: Spacious studio in West VIllage
review: El apartamento de Harry es acogedor, muy luminoso,  perfecto para 1-2 personas, y está muy bien equipado. Queda a 2-3 manzanas del metro y en una calle bastante tranquila de una zona de restaurantes y bares. Harry, que no estaba en la ciudad, fue muy cuidadoso al darme las instrucciones para entrar a la casa.
